text:
Fraight AI | Senior Fullstack Engineer | Chicago, IL | Onsite Full Time

Fraight is an early stage, ambitious logistics technology company. We write software that coordinates truck shipments. We are working on challenging, real world problems that require unconventional interdisciplinary thinking. Our goal is to revolutionize the logistics industry through automation and AI to reduce the cost of transporting freight and to eliminate waste.

Apply Here: https://fraight.workable.com/j/FBBCEE3D85
